name: KANSAS, petitioner, v. Reginald Dexter CARR, Jr.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
KANSAS, petitioner,
v.
Reginald Dexter CARR, Jr.

opinions.text: Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperisgranted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Kansas granted limited to Questions 1 and 3 presented by the petition. The cases are consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.

casebody.head_matter:
KANSAS, petitioner,
v.
Reginald Dexter CARR, Jr.
No. 14-450.
Supreme Court of the United States
March 30, 2015.
Opinion
